name: derclinnm
description: A comprehensive directory of dermatology clinics across the USA

scripts.verify:routes: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='.open-next/_routes.json';if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.error('❌ .open-next/_routes.json MISSING');process.exit(1);}const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'));const expect={version:1,include:['/*'],exclude:['/assets/*']};if(JSON.stringify(j)!==JSON.stringify(expect)){console.error('❌ _routes.json CONTENT MISMATCH:', j);process.exit(1);}console.log('✅ _routes.json OK');"
scripts.preview: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages dev .open-next
scripts.deploy: npm run pages:build && wrangler pages deploy .open-next --project-name cd-base-clean-expand-final --branch main
